Product Description

Incanto Shine Was Launched In March 2007 By Salvatore Ferragamo. It Is A Fruity Floral Fragrance In A Colourful Bottle Adorned With Carefree Summer Motives. It Starts With Fresh Notes Of Pineapple Bergamot And Passion Fruit. Pink Peony Freesia And Pea
